name: Signature Aura Facial
summary: Customized facial for balanced, luminous skin.
description: Our signature treatment combines gentle cleansing, extractions, and a customized mask tailored to your skin's needs. Each session includes calming massage techniques to reduce tension and support lymphatic flow.

name: Classic European Facial
summary: Deep cleansing and relaxation for all skin types.

name: HydraFacial
summary: Medical-grade hydration and exfoliation for instant glow.
description: A multi-step treatment using the HydraFacial system to cleanse, extract, hydrate, and protect your skin. This gentle, no-downtime treatment leaves skin immediately glowing and plump with hydration.

name: Calming Barrier Facial
summary: Soothing, hydration‑forward care for sensitized skin.

name: Clarifying Facial with Extractions
summary: Deep cleansing with gentle extractions for congested skin.

name: Dermaplaning
summary: Ultra‑smooth exfoliation for instant radiance and texture refinement.
description: A gentle exfoliation technique using a sterile blade to remove dead skin cells and peach fuzz. Results in instantly smoother, brighter skin with improved product absorption and makeup application.

name: Chemical Peel
summary: Customized peel for improved texture, tone, and clarity.

name: Microneedling
summary: Collagen-boosting treatment for fine lines, scars, and texture.

name: LED Light Therapy
summary: Red and blue light therapy for healing, anti-aging, and acne.

name: Microcurrent Facial
summary: Non-invasive lifting and toning for sculpted facial contours.

name: Lymphatic Drainage Facial
summary: Gentle massage to reduce puffiness and promote detoxification.
description: A therapeutic facial combining specialized lymphatic massage techniques to reduce puffiness, improve circulation, and support skin's natural detoxification process. Ideal for sensitive or congested skin.

name: Buccal Facial Massage
summary: Intra-oral massage for jaw tension, sculpting, and lifted appearance.
description: An advanced therapeutic massage working both inside and outside the mouth to release tension in jaw muscles, reduce TMJ symptoms, and create a more sculpted, lifted facial appearance.

name: Brow Lamination
summary: Lifted, fuller-looking brows that stay in place.
description: A lifting and setting treatment that transforms unruly brows into structured, polished arches. The process creates the appearance of thicker brows while keeping them perfectly in place for 6–8 weeks.

name: Brow Shape & Tint
summary: Custom shaping with tint for natural definition.

name: Lash Lift & Tint
summary: Low‑maintenance curl and depth for natural lashes.

name: Brow Lamination + Tint Combo
summary: Full brow transformation with lamination and custom tint.

name: Brow Wax
summary: Clean, defined brow shape.

name: Lip Wax
summary: Quick, gentle hair removal.

name: Chin Wax
summary: Smooth chin and jawline.

name: Full Face Wax
summary: Complete facial hair removal for smooth, glowing skin.

name: Underarm Wax
summary: Smooth underarms with gentle technique.
